alert.note: Alert for Winnebago (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 02 at 3:32AM CDT until April 02 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Wet and heavy snow with slushy accumulations and low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches including on bridges and overpasses are expected. * WHERE...Winnebago County. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 1 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Prepare for a sloppy morning with wet, heavy snow and low visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
